project.name: Scope 3 Reduce Module
project.target_audience: Procurement Officers, CSOs, Supply Chain Managers

headings.usage: Uppercase, tracking-tight, used for KPIs, Section Headers, and Data Labels.

body.usage: High legibility for data tables and narrative text.

mono.usage: For specific data values, contract clauses, and code snippets.

typography.installation: Import from Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Barlow+Condensed:wght@600;700;800&family=Manrope:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400&display=swap');

rules: Data visualizations must use neon accents against dark backgrounds.
Text contrast must meet APCA standards.

surfaces.cards: Flat background (#121212) with 1px border (white/10). No shadow by default.
surfaces.overlays: Glassmorphism (The Crystal Variant): bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-xl border-white/10.
surfaces.tables: Grid Borders: border-collapse, border-r border-b border-white/5.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:bg-primary/90 hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(34,197,94,0.4)] transition-all

cards.style: Data-dense. Header with metric, body with chart/list. Use 'Grid Borders' style.

modals.style: Slide-out from right (Sheet component). Glassmorphism background. 50% to 80% width.

charts.style: Minimalist. Hide grid lines or make them very subtle. Use neon strokes.

heatmap.description: A grid of colored squares representing carbon intensity. Green (Low) to Red (High).
heatmap.interaction: Hover to see specific supplier details.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background to reduce banding.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px. Small sizes (w-4 h-4) for density.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'Barlow Condensed' and 'Manrope' fonts immediately.
2. THEME: Force Dark Mode by default. Add 'dark' class to html/body.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'Main Dashboard' using a CSS Grid (Bento style). Do not use a simple vertical stack.
4. COMPONENT: Create a 'SupplierRow' component that expands or triggers the 'DeepDivePanel'.
5. AI FEATURE: The 'Deep Dive' panel must feel like an AI insight. Use a 'sparkle' icon or a glowing border effect to denote AI-generated content.
6. DATA: Mock at least 10 rows of supplier data with: Organization Name, Category, CEE Rating (A-F), Reduction Potential (%), Upstream Impact (%).
7. AUTH: Mock the Google OAuth login on the landing page. Just a button that redirects to dashboard.
8. CRITICAL: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background. Use text-gray-300 for secondary text, not text-gray-500.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
